text: Exelastis crepuscularis is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from South Africa and São Tomé and Principe. The larvae feed on Alysicarpus vaginalis. ==References== Category:Exelastini Category:Moths described in 1909 Category:Moths of India Category:Moths of Africa Category:Insects of São Tomé and Príncipe
title: Exelastis crepuscularis
